name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook responds to an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data from a compromised server.

action--e10f77e4-21d8-4b09-b891-58e7558b.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--e10f77e4-21d8-4b09-b891-58e7558b.description: Terminate any malicious PowerShell processes that may be running.

action--b8cd9799-ff9e-48a1-82c1-cc25f901.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--b8cd9799-ff9e-48a1-82c1-cc25f901.description: Take the affected host offline to prevent further damage.

parallel--c7f5ac7c-25b8-48ac-9e57-57fc5d.name: Execute additional mitigations
parallel--c7f5ac7c-25b8-48ac-9e57-57fc5d.description: Run a malware scan and update firewall rules.

action--d15f7939-e392-4b62-95c0-7bb9b20a.name: Conduct a full malware scan
action--d15f7939-e392-4b62-95c0-7bb9b20a.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the affected host.

while-condition--6f7f321d-dae9-4c2e-a51f.name: Repeat scan until no threats detected
while-condition--6f7f321d-dae9-4c2e-a51f.description: Repeat the malware scan until no threats are found.

action--493c245b-65da-495d-b7f7-f8aa2cce.name: Update firewall rules to block outbound connections
action--493c245b-65da-495d-b7f7-f8aa2cce.description: Update firewall rules to prevent exfiltration of data.

commands.command: ufw deny out to any port 80,443

action--a40c0f63-51a0-4903-a71b-f9f0801e.name: Notify security team for further investigation
action--a40c0f63-51a0-4903-a71b-f9f0801e.description: Alert the security team about the incident for further actions.

commands.command: echo 'Incident detected on host-34' | mail -s 'Security Alert' security-team@company.com
